intro_day1_text:
After days of wandering through the wilderness,
 I finally stumbled upon a settlement.

I should introduce myself to the locals
and find supplies for the journey ahead.
writerGoodbye: Writer: "Good luck! Don't forget to write."
armorerQuest: Want some shield? I don‚Äôt have the materials to forge it. Bring me 14 stones from the Bizarre Forest.
armorerSuccess: Whoa, that‚Äôs a lot of stones! Great work. Here, I‚Äôve forged a Shield for you.
armorerGoodbye: Take good care of that shield.
merchantGoodbye: Merchant: "Come back if you get hungry."
merchantSell: I'm out of potatoes, but I can sell you one for 50 coins.
merchantBought: It's a pleasure doing business with you! Here's your potato.
merchantNoMoney: You don‚Äôt have enough coins! Come back when you're richer.
heroThoughts_cantLeave: (Thoughts): I can't leave without a diary. I need to record everything.
heroThoughts_needPotato: (Thoughts): Can't go into the forest without supplies. The Merchant had some food.
heroThoughts_bag: Phew, my belongings are intact! Even my journal survived.
heroThoughts_mustFindBag: I need to find my things...
diary_day1_text: And here I am in the big town. There wasn‚Äôt really anywhere to go, so I visited several houses and shops. In one of the houses, I came across a writer. She gave me an empty journal so that I could record my journey.
potato_day1_text: Visited several countryside market stalls. The merchant gave me raw potatoes for growing.
shield_day1_text: I stopped by the weaponsmith and told him that I was planning to travel across the square world. He liked my idea and promised to hand me a shield.
forest_day1_text: By evening, I had left the city and entered a peculiar forest. I decided to search for a place to settle and develop. Dusk was falling
mountains_day1_text: Walking along the road in the peculiar forest, I ran into some enemies. I had to fight them with a stone dagger. I managed to stab one of the enemies almost immediately. However, another one turned out to be stronger, and I had to retreat into the mountains. During my ‚Äútactical retreat,‚Äù I didn‚Äôt notice a stone lying on the ground, tripped over it, tumbled down several blocks, and blacked out.
rebirth_day2_text: I came to the city‚Äôs infirmary in the morning. I had no belongings with me. They said that they might be located below the place where I was found. I spent the first half of the day searching for the spot where I had fallen. Sure enough ‚Äî all my belongings were there. I spent the rest of the day on the mountain, making entries in my journal. There were no monsters on the slope, and I managed to get some sleep.
